entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening and ending before morning then 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 30 January 2023
